title: Bug 4971 - Unexpected Result in 'Copy Package'
description: This bug report pertains to an issue in the 'copy package' operation, occurring in version 2031 of the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' component within 'jdt.ui'.
OB: Upon performing this operation, the package 'ui' is mistakenly copied to a destination labeled 'xx'.
EB: The expected behavior should involve copying the package from 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui', not 'ui', to the specified destination 'xx'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a project in version 2031.
2. Access the package viewer within the project.
3. Select the 'ui' package.
4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
